Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in the Atelier Luxe catalog.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

imageUrl.description: URL of the product's main image.

category.description: The category the product belongs to (e.g., Men's Clothing, Women's Clothing).

additionalImageUrls.description: URLs of additional images for the product.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a review for a product.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Review entity.

rating.description: The rating given in the review (e.g., 1 to 5).

date.description: The date the review was submitted.

CartItem.title: CartItem
CartItem.description: Represents an item in the shopping cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CartItem entity.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in the cart.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Order entity.

orderDate.description: The date the order was placed.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order.

status.description: The status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, shipped, completed).

receiptImageDataUri.description: A Base64 encoded data URI of the user's payment receipt image.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents an item within an order.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OrderItem entity.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in this order item.

price.description: The price of the product at the time of the order.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has administrative privileges.

favoriteProductIds.description: References to Products. (Relationship: UserProfile N:N Product (favorites))

/products/{productId}.description: Stores product information. Accessible to all users for reading.

/products/{productId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores reviews for each product. Anyone can create a review for any product, but listing reviews is open.

/userProfiles/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Only the authenticated user can read/write their own profile. Admins can read any profile.

/userProfiles/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores order information for a user. A user can only access their own orders. Admins can read/update any order.

/cartItems/{cartItemId}.description: This collection is deprecated and no longer in use.

/profile-pictures/{userId}/{fileName}.description: Users can upload their own profile pictures.
